sub_title: Senior Team Leader | Data Science Dept | R&I Clinical Research & Health Data
summary:
I am dedicated to developing new insights in the field of data and life sciences. With over 20 years of experience I have a broad background in working on demanding projects and training employees, where I always see a way to achieve goals. I lead a team of 5 people to develop cloud-based data science tools for non-clinical, pre-clinical, and clinical datasets. My expertise lies at the intersection of medical biology and data science. 

I am a lifelong learner and eager to explore new opportunities to further develop and make use of my competencies in an R&D environment. I am not only passionate about applying science, but also about communicating science. I have presented to high-school students during the yearly Brain Awareness Week, and spoke about my work at BNR Nieuwsradio (650.000 listeners) and Het Klokhuis (400.000 viewers). My work was featured in BBC Horizon, featuring Rory Bremner (2.5 to 3 million viewers).

Let‚Äôs connect!

[{'date': {'start': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': 2001}, 'end': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': 2012}}, 'role': 'Mentor and Science Advisor', 'company': {'id': None, 'name': 'PhysicsForums.com', 'logo': None, 'url': None}, 'cause': 'EDUCATION', 'description': 'üì£ PF member: "I wanted to let you know that you, in some way, inspired me to go onto biology while in University. [..] I work with ES and iPS cells now and this is my life for the moment. [..] You helped direct me towards real science. So thank you!"​

‚ñ∂Ô∏é PF mission: "Our goal is to provide a community for people (whether students, professional scientists, or hobbyists) to learn and discuss science as it is currently generally understood and practiced by the professional scientific community.
